name: Hit&Run VR baseball
description:
Now, You can experience real-like baseball stadium fields atmosphere.

Hit & Run VR is a indoor virtual sports game which you can play like a real baseball player.

Just push the trigger button and hit the ball! Make your highest score!

Having Fun !


- GAME MODE info -

* Practice Play
You can practice hitting a flying ball. And you can check balls distances.

* Battle Play
When you select battle Play, You can choose Hitter mode or Pitcher mode.
Play Inning 1 means final(9) inning , Inning 2 means 8 inning.
So, You can play like a fianl inning batter or pitcher.
